Redlands Sports Complex: Phase I is a 35-acre site located at the northeast corner of Dearborn Street and San Bernardino Avenue. It is scheduled to be open for soccer activity in early 2008. This phase includes 8 full-sized soccer fields with lighting and a basketball court. Off-street parking is accessible from Dearborn Street north of San Bernardino Avenue. The facility is reserved for scheduled soccer activity. Future phases are in the construction planning stage and will include 4 additional lighted soccer fields, 15 acres of open field and recreational space, and a softball complex.
